channel.title: Platoon's new maps idea's
channel.description:
hello
my nick name is platoon but my account name wrong
guys somebodys know who am i, im making new maps for hl1 etc..
and one my friend said "share what you do" and im making now some maps learning "sdk/hammer" and in this time im learned a lot of things and want to share my 2 test maps im want to make more and some story maps ...
im just want to share my maps... ok.. maybe they not good maps they nothing, but i hope you guys like it
[url='https://rapidshare.com/files/232171061/platoon_test_maps.rar.html']https://rapidshare.com/files/232171061/platoon_test_maps.rar.html[/url]
in this file there is 2 map file
1 story (starting.bsp): in the hl2 fight, gordan freeman going to the city 15 and helping civil's. defending the line, striders coming to the city and war is starting ...
2 story (zombies.bsp): gordan freeman in some dark room and must escape in the area this is zombies with freeman fight story
this maps is just for my test's and i will make more soon
enjoy!...
[img]https://i0905.hizliresim.com/2009/5/13/2323.jpg[/img]
starting map pictures: 1:_[url='https://i0905.hizliresim.com/2009/5/13/2286.jpg']https://i0905.hizliresim.com/2009/5/13/2286.jpg[/url] 2:_[url='https://i0905.hizliresim.com/2009/5/13/2294.jpg']https://i0905.hizliresim.com/2009/5/13/2294.jpg[/url] 3:_[url='https://i0905.hizliresim.com/2009/5/13/2300.jpg']https://i0905.hizliresim.com/2009/5/13/2300.jpg[/url] 4:_[url='https://i0905.hizliresim.com/2009/5/13/2307.jpg']https://i0905.hizliresim.com/2009/5/13/2307.jpg[/url] 5:_[url='https://i0905.hizliresim.com/2009/5/13/2313.jpg']https://i0905.hizliresim.com/2009/5/13/2313.jpg[/url] 6:_[url='https://i0905.hizliresim.com/2009/5/13/2316.jpg']https://i0905.hizliresim.com/2009/5/13/2316.jpg[/url] 7:_[url='https://i0905.hizliresim.com/2009/5/13/2328.jpg']https://i0905.hizliresim.com/2009/5/13/2328.jpg[/url]
[img]https://i0905.hizliresim.com/2009/5/13/2404.jpg[/img] zombies map pictures: 1:_[url='https://i0905.hizliresim.com/2009/5/13/2396.jpg']https://i0905.hizliresim.com/2009/5/13/2396.jpg[/url] 2:_[url='https://i0905.hizliresim.com/2009/5/13/2403.jpg']https://i0905.hizliresim.com/2009/5/13/2403.jpg[/url] 3:_[url='https://i0905.hizliresim.com/2009/5/13/2405.jpg']https://i0905.hizliresim.com/2009/5/13/2405.jpg[/url] 4:_[url='https://i0905.hizliresim.com/2009/5/13/2407.jpg']https://i0905.hizliresim.com/2009/5/13/2407.jpg[/url] 6:_[url='https://i0905.hizliresim.com/2009/5/13/2409.jpg']https://i0905.hizliresim.com/2009/5/13/2409.jpg[/url]

item.title: Platoon's new maps idea's
item.dc:creator: Deathmonkey7
item.description:
At least there’s considerably more architecture than there was before. You may consider however, making simple things not so simple. For instance, the brick fence/wall you have int he bottom left corner of the first screenshot… Try adding supports every few feet, or make the top stick out a little more than the rest. Stuff like that can make a map far more interesting.

Read full topic

item.title: Platoon's new maps idea's
item.dc:creator: Lamsey
item.description:
There are actually quite a few areas in Glasgow with white streetlights. It makes the place look quite nice.

Read full topic

item.title: Platoon's new maps idea's
item.dc:creator: geekofalltrades
item.description:
Exhibit A: All of your outdoor screenshots.

Exhibit B: What actual streetlights look like.
https://www.crutchleyhistory.co.uk/IMAGES/streetlight.jpg
https://media.giantbomb.com/uploads/0/1619/514079-street_light_large.jpg
https://www.westberks.gov.uk/media/image/j/j/_T1C2436-low-res_1.jpg
https://pig.sty.nu/Pictures/misc/proper-snow/half_03-stroboscopic_street_light_snow.jpg

Exhibit C: A pair of actual streetlights, neither of which, you’ll notice, is giving off white light.
https://www.gg-energy.com/images/GGETrailerNight.jpg

And before you ask, yes, I am going to keep pounding this point. White light looks silly.

Read full topic

item.title: Platoon's new maps idea's
item.dc:creator: Master_Chef
item.description:
I don’t recall you asking before, but here it is:

My great-grandparents (dad’s side) were completely German, while their children were born in Germany, but moved to America, where I am under the impression that they married into families of similar heritage. My parents are half-german (mom) and one third german (dad). Mix the results, and the additional 15% Dutch added through the generations, and you have me being almost half german. Mind you, it might not be 45% exactly, as it could possibly just be 40%, or maybe even 50%.

Now that we have clarified that,

TOPIC: Are you planning on releasing these maps separatly or as a campaign?

Read full topic

item.title: Platoon's new maps idea's
item.dc:creator: raw_bean
item.description:
Again with the 45%. I asked you about that last time and you didn’t answer. It makes no sense at all. But then, this is you…

Read full topic

item.title: Platoon's new maps idea's
item.dc:creator: Master_Chef
item.description:
raw_bean:

Fuck off. I’m British, but I guess it must be my German ancestry that makes me feel like responding to your prejudice and stereotyping with such vehemence.

I’m 45% German, and I have relatives there, so I don’t hate them or anything. It’s just that I can’t stand their manners at times. So yeah, it must be my German ancestry that allows me to brush of your rage with such indifference.

Read full topic

item.title: Platoon's new maps idea's
item.dc:creator: geekofalltrades
item.description:
Okay, Platoon, the first thing that jumps out at me about ALL of your maps in this thread is that your lighting in the indoor areas is white. I challenge you to try to find a lamp of any kind that gives off white light. Incandescent light bulbs tend to have a yellowish tint to them, while fluorescent bulbs have a very light bluish tint. Just changing this will go a long way towards improving your maps.

Read full topic
